mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SY_CUSTOMER_QUESTION_BOARD (MEMBER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, PUBLIC_YN) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{publicYn})
mapper.select: SELECT Q.POST_ID, Q.TITLE, M.USER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(Q.CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATE_DATE, Q.PUBLIC_YN FROM SY_CUSTOMER_QUESTION_BOARD Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SY_MEMBER M ON( Q.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID ) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT Q.POST_ID, M.USER_NM, M.MEMBER_ID, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.ANSWER, DATE_FORMAT(Q.CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATE_DATE, Q.PUBLIC_YN FROM SY_CUSTOMER_QUESTION_BOARD Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SY_MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_ID = Q.MEMBER_ID) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' AND Q.POST_ID = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SY_ATTACHMENT_BOARD (FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NM, CHANGE_NM, EXT, DIVSN, POST_ID) SELECT #{filePath} AS FILE_PATH, #{originNm} AS ORIGIN_NM, #{changeNm} AS CHANGE_NM, #{ext} AS EXT, '자료실', MAX(POST_ID) AS POST_ID FROM SY_CUSTOMER_MATERIAL_BOARD
mapper.select: SELECT POST_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATE_DATE, FROM SY_CUSTOMER_FAQ_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT POST_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, ANSWER, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATE_DATE, FROM SY_CUSTOMER_FAQ_BOARD WHERE POST_ID = #{postId}
